entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
